subject: Missing USB Cable - Order SSN5472
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

I received my Simsonn HS Pro Shifter, but the USB cable is missing from the
box.

Could you please send me the missing cable?

Order Number:
Order #SSN5472


Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Nwonknu,  We’re very sorry—our packing team accidentally missed the USB cable in your shipment. We will send you a replacement USB cable immediately. Sorry again for the inconvenience.
Hi Nwonknu,    Here is your logistics tracking link. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047245036765
